channel.title: Ggjoy on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Ggjoy on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Joyplots with ggjoy + hrbrthemes
item.description: Haven’t you run into articles with some data that makes you think, how can visualize the data in a different and possibly better way? We will be use Joyplots for this post. Joyplots are partially overlapping line plots that create the impression of a mountain range. They can be quite useful for visualizing changes in distributions over time or space1. The data that we will be looking at is 2016 temperatures in Lincoln, NE23.
